titleStmt.title: John W. Finnell, Receipt to R. J. Sparks
CWG13737

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 10; 1863 Office Expenses - Telegraph, Stationary - Transportation - Ordinance Stores; Bundle 5

body.p:
NO. 12.
The State of Kentucky,
To R J Sparks Dr.

row.cell: To transportation on Leuts from Lagrange to Eminence
To freight on rashens from Louisville to Drennon Lick
To hauling rashens from river to Drennon Springs

body.p:
Approved
By order of the Governor
Jno. W. Finnell
Adjt Genl Ky Vols
I certify that the above account is correct and just; that the services were rendered as stated; and that they were necessary for the public service.
J. S. Todd Col 44th Ky Infty

Received at Frankfort Ky, the 11 of Feby 1863, of Jno W Finnell Adjt Genl, Quarter-master Kentucky Volunteers, the sum of Five Dollars and eighty two Cents, in full of the above account.
(DUPLICATE.)

NO. 12.
No. 80 ABSTRACT B P Qr. 186
R J Sparks
Dollars 5.82/100
Paid Feby 11 1863
